tool_description: Analyzes policy exclusions against claim details to determine if any exclusions apply that would deny or limit coverage.

policy_exclusions.description: List of policy exclusions from coverage

claim_description.description: Detailed description of the claim circumstances

claim_cause.description: Primary cause or peril that led to the loss

additional_factors.description: Additional circumstances that may affect exclusion analysis

error_messages: Missing exclusions: Policy exclusions list cannot be empty. Provide at least one exclusion clause.
Insufficient claim details: Claim description must be detailed enough for exclusion analysis.
Invalid claim type: Claim type must be a recognized insurance claim category.
Cause not specified: Primary cause of loss must be clearly specified for exclusion analysis.
Exclusion analysis failed: Unable to determine exclusion applicability. Review claim details and policy exclusions.
usage: Input policy_exclusions, claim_description, claim_type, and claim_cause to analyze potential exclusions. Optionally include additional_factors for comprehensive analysis. Returns exclusion applicability assessment.

exclusions_apply.description: Whether any exclusions apply to this claim

applicable_exclusions.description: List of exclusions that apply to the claim

exclusion_impact.description: Impact of exclusions (full denial, partial denial, or coverage exception)
